valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Tue 13 Jan 2026 to 12:00 (UTC) on Wed 14 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: Low FitzRoy 998 expected north Biscay 1009 by 0600 tomorrow

Viking.text:
Wind
In west, cyclonic 3 to 5, becoming westerly 6 or 7. In east, southeasterly becoming cyclonic, 7 to severe gale 9, becoming westerly 4 to 6 later.
Sea state
In west, rough, occasionally very rough at first. in east, rough occasionally very rough.
Weather
Occasional rain.
Visibility
In west, good, occasionally poor. In east, moderate, occasionally poor.
